changecredits.name: changecredits
changecredits.description: Changes or sets Creative Credits for a specific user
changecredits.invalidArg0: Please use either "add", "remove" or "set" to change a user's Creative Credits!
changecredits.arg1NaN: Please enter a valid amount of Creative Credits!
changecredits.arg1TooLarge: Can't set Creative Credits to more than 2147483647!
changecredits.setNegative: You can't set someone's Creative Credits to be negative! They'll be in debt and that's just cruel :pleading_face:

credits.name: credits
credits.description: Checks your own Creative Credits balance or those of other users
credits.invalidUser: Couldn't find the user you were looking for!

setevent.name: setevent
setevent.description: Sets a server's event channel or deletes the event association of the current event channel
setevent.arg0NaN: You need to enter a number as a channel ID!
setevent.deletedChannel: Previous event channel is no longer considered an event channel!

submit.name: submit
submit.description: Submits an entry for the current event in the server's event channel
submit.noEventChannel: This server doesn't have an event channel!
submit.noActiveEvent: There is currently no active event. Please return later.

toggleevent.name: toggleevent
toggleevent.description: Turns the event channel for a server on or off, allowing or disallowing submissions to be posted to said channel
toggleevent.noEventChannel: This server doesn't have an event channel!

math.name: math
math.description: Tests your math skills and quick thinking with an exercise that needs to be solved in a few seconds
math.questionMessage:
**Question:** {{initialValue}} {{mathOperator}} {{term}} = ?
Quick, you only have {{timeForAnswering}} seconds to answer!
math.correctAnswer:
Correct answer! :smile:
You have been granted {{amount}} Creative Credits for answering correctly!
math.wrongAnswer:
Wrong answer! The result was {{result}}! :frowning:
You have lost {{amount}} Creative Credits as a result!
math.noAnswer:
You didn't answer in time! The correct answer would have been {{result}}! :sweat:
You have lost {{amount}} Creative Credits as a result!

obama.name: obama
obama.description: Sends an inspiring Obama picture with an equally inspiring message (hopefully)

slots.name: slots
slots.description: Simulates a slot machine, but without the monetary losses...and gains. You win if there are horizontal or diagonal lines of matching symbols
slots.arg0NaN: Please enter a number as a bet!
slots.negativeBet: Nice try, but I thought of that. Please enter a bet above 0.
slots.tooLargeBet: Your bet exceeds the amount of Creative Credits you have!
slots.lostBet:
Unfortunately, you lost your bet :frowning:
Better luck next time!

thumbsup.name: thumbsup
thumbsup.description: Gives the user mentioned a thumbs up on their last message :thumbsup:
thumbsup.invalidUser: You just specified an invalid user! Who am I supposed to react to? :frowning:
thumbsup.cantFindLastMessage: Couldn't find the last message of the specified user, sorry! :flushed:
